title: 85/128/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 January 1985 on the approval of the special programme for the region of Basilicata concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 25 January 1985
on the approval of the special programme for the region of Basilicata concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(85/128/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The specific programme forwarded by the Italian Government on 19 March 1984, as amplified by information supplied on 24 May and 14 September 1984, for the region of Basilicata concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 January 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 27.
